attributes.action: give public recognition and honour to Barry Sindall, Headteacher of Colyton Grammar School, Devon,  in recognition of his visionary leadership of one of the top state schools in England.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Barry Sindall has taken Colyton Grammar School from being a relatively ordinary Grammar School to one which is recognised as brilliant,throughout the educational world. His introduction of "Critical Thinking" as a core subject throughout the school, is just one example of his wonderful overview. He MUST be honoured and recognised in this, his retirement year.
